entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023
